channel.title: Help with error java.lang.outofmemory
channel.description: I have a problem with my server when every once in a while I get an error outofmemory java heap space or whatever. I know you can fix this, I've seen other people have this problem, but I dont know how, can someone help me or link me a tut on how to fix this error?

item.title: Help with error java.lang.outofmemory
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Try using correct Object Orientated Programming structure. It’s like that because you don’t correctly dispose of connections, threads, objects, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with error java.lang.outofmemory
item.dc:creator: @negative101 negative101
item.description:
@negative101 wrote:

so way is he difference other than numbers if u have 512 and 1024?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with error java.lang.outofmemory
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

Try allocating more memory to the Java Virtual Machine

Read full topic

item.title: Help with error java.lang.outofmemory
item.dc:creator: @Trigger1 Trigger*
item.description:
@Trigger1 wrote:

You are running low on RAM.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with error java.lang.outofmemory
item.dc:creator: @MoparScaperDude MoparScaperDude
item.description:
@MoparScaperDude wrote:

Edit the run.bat, and look for something along the lines of:

Xmx-#

Change the number to 1024.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with error java.lang.outofmemory
item.dc:creator: @wild_chino wild chino
item.description:
@wild_chino wrote:

[quote=“Razr`, post:3, topic:99796”]Wow, you heaped your application?

The only fix to this is better programming, the other short term fixes aren’t worth it.[/quote]i downloaded a 508 client and after a while playing it…the next day i go to play it and it didnt let me. and now i really wana play a client lol =[

Read full topic
